description: The Acting Grand Master of the Knights of Favonius, Jean is a versatile Anemo sword user who excels at healing and supporting her team.
info: Jean is a flexible healer and support who can cleanse, heal, and group enemies. Build her for ATK%, Energy Recharge, and Healing Bonus.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Favonius Bladework
skills.desc: Performs up to 5 consecutive sword strikes.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 consecutive sword strikes.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to launch enemies using the power of wind.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Gale Blade
skills.desc: Jean releases a miniature storm, launching enemies in the direction she aims, dealing Anemo DMG.
skills.details_html:
Gale Blade
Jean releases a miniature storm, launching enemies in the direction she aims, dealing Anemo DMG. Holding the skill increases its power and launch distance.

skills.name: Dandelion Breeze
skills.desc: Jean calls upon the wind to launch surrounding enemies and heal all party members. Healing scales with Jean's ATK.
skills.details_html:
Dandelion Breeze
Jean calls upon the wind to launch surrounding enemies and heal all party members. Healing scales with Jean's ATK.

passive_talents.name: Wind Companion
passive_talents.desc: Hits by Normal Attacks have a 50% chance to regenerate HP equal to 15% of Jean's ATK for all party members.

passive_talents.name: Let the Wind Lead
passive_talents.desc: Using Dandelion Breeze regenerates 20% of its Energy.

passive_talents.name: Guiding Breeze
passive_talents.desc: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, Jean has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: Spiraling Tempest
constellations.desc: Increases the pulling speed of Gale Blade after holding for more than 1s by 40%.

constellations.name: People's Aegis
constellations.desc: When Jean picks up an Elemental Orb/Particle, all party members have their Movement SPD and ATK SPD increased by 15% for 15s.

constellations.name: When the West Wind Arises
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Dandelion Breeze by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Lands of Dandelion
constellations.desc: Within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze, all opponents have their Anemo RES decreased by 40%.

constellations.name: Outbursting Gust
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Gale Blade by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Lion's Fang, Fair Protector of Mondstadt
constellations.desc: Incoming DMG is decreased by 35% within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze. Upon leaving the Field, this effect lasts for 3 attacks or 10s.
